value:
An unfamiliar land full of unfamiliar
people... Were my husband here,
he'd no doubt be buried in research.

Does the water here seem a bit...soft?
When I make tea, I just can't seem to
get the same flavor I get in Etruria.

Please, call me Louise. It would make
me happy if you could see me not as
a noble or commoner, but as a peer.

Quivering simply won't do. You must
stand up tall, with your back straight
and your head high. That's it.

I used to do the girls' hair. Even in
the midst of battle, a woman's beauty
ought not to be concealed.

I come with a gift and to check on you
in $Nf's stead.

Goodness! I imagine even my
husband would be impressed
by that.

If I put in a little more effort, will
I be able to fire even farther, do
you suppose?

Oh! My bowstring snapped!
What an ominous sign...

I'm confident in my accuracy,
so you can trust this skill will
be put to good use.

My name is Louise, wife of Pent,
Count Reglay of Etruria. Are you
in some kind of trouble?$k$pIf we work together, I'm sure we can
make it through any struggle.

Oh my, Summoner, how do you do?
It feels like we've been meeting quite
often lately, though I'm happy to talk.$k$pYou're not interrupting anything.
I've reached a stopping point in
my journaling for today.$k$pThe joys and tragedies of each day...
Memories of my husband... Anything
and everything. I want to remember.$k$pI hope, when peace comes, we can
reflect on our current anxieties with
some fondness, as distant memories.$k$pI hope to tell these stories to my
children one day...$k$pWhen and if Lord Pent and I have
children, I hope they grow to be as
wise and bighearted as you are.
えいっ
やぁっ
きゃああっ！
そんな…
Bows are my specialty!
Forgive my rudeness.
You mustn't!
My apologies!
Forgive me, my love...
Oh, hello!
I am Louise. The honor is all mine.
My, you sure are friendly, aren't you!
Despite my upbringing, I shoot much better than I dance or sing.
Loving another person can fill you with endless joy and energy!
I am always pleased to be of service!
Once it begins to turn, they say, none can halt the wheel of fate...
Having met and spent time with you, I can tell you truly are irreplaceable.
My pleasure.
What can I do?
I've a task to perform!
